answers.answer: I think there's different flavours but I've only ever had the one that tastes like that ****** orange drink from McDonald's.
I took a sugar test and the drink was a little too sweet . Tasted like medicine . I'm 33 weeks , so you'll be fine . ☺️

If you're talking about the gestational diabetes test, I thought the solution tasted like really strong and sweet Gatorade. I didn't think it tasted bad at all, but I wouldn't want to drink it all day. Most labs keep it in the fridge since it tastes better cold, just chug it about you'll be fine.
It actually taist good. They have like Hawaiian punch flavor and orange soda flavor. Trust me I thought it would be awful too
It's as sweet as a Sprite is. Not bad at all.
The drink isn't that nasty but the aftertaste is nasty and it burned my throat

question: The test they do i think it said weeks 22-26 or something like that... we're you have to drink the 50 grams o's special surgary drink. How bad does it taste??
title: testing
